text: 'Lea Pericoli (22 March 1935 â€“ 4 October 2024) was an Italian tennis player, television presenter and journalist. She was born in Milan, Italy. She came in sixteenth place of the French Open two times and the thee times in the Wimbledon Championships. Pericoli died on 4 October 2024 in Milan at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Italian television presenters Category:Italian journalists Category:Sportspeople from Milan Category:Writers from Milan Category:Tennis players
title: Lea Pericoli
